name: Sovrun
description: Sovrun is reimagining gaming by empowering players to own their digital assets and evolve from participants to architects of their virtual worlds. The ecosystem spans from low-touch innovations like NFTs and token-based ownership, to high-touch experiences such as co-creation within fully on-chain games and Autonomous Worlds (AW). From asset creation to player-driven economies to permissionlessly building on composable and modular environments, Sovrun pioneers the next era of interactive entertainment where deeper participation, empowerment, and engagement shape the future of gaming.
